articles.title: Judge Dismisses Lawsuit Against PlayStation Over Digital Game Sales - PlayStation LifeStyle
articles.description: A judge has dismissed a lawsuit against Sony alleging a "monopoly" over PS Store downloads. Here's how it played out.
